Name: Warm Up
Description: Play for at least 2 minutes in a single round

Name: In The Zone
Description: Play for at least 5 minutes in a single round

Name: Endurance Mode
Description: Play for at least 10 minutes in a single round

Name: Can't Stop, Won't Stop!
Description: Play for at least 20 minutes in a single round

Name: 2048 Master Marathon
Description: Play for at least 30 minutes in a single round
